item.title: The Hard Thing About Hard Things - Ben Horowitz: Book Review
item.description: I came across 'http://www.amazon.co.uk/The-Hard-Thing-About-Things/dp/0062273205/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1413108493&sr=8-1&keywords=hard+thing+about+hard+things[The Hard Thing About Hard Things]' while reading an article about Ben Horowitz’s venture capital firm and it was intriguing enough that I bought it and then read through it over a couple of days. Although the blurb suggests that it’s a book about about building and running a startup I think a lot of the lessons are applicable for any business.
